results.content: So I am a procedural programmer with personal rather than professional experience, now learning Python for my job. Oh boy this is so GREAT.

results.content: the course is very straightforward, the instructor is doing a great job explaining complex terminology and providing clean-cut, easy to understand examples along the way. highly recommend!
